mapper.select: select rht.id,rht.city_id,rht.county_id,rht.probe_id,rht.port,rht.task_id,rht.service_type,rht.target_id,rht.target_ip,rht.record_date,rht.remark, city.city_name AS city_name, county.county_name AS area_name, probe.probe_name AS probe_name, probe.access_layer, target.target_name AS target_name, time_format(record_time, '%H') AS record_time, AVG(rht.delay) AS delay, AVG(rht.delay_std) AS delay_std, AVG(rht.delay_var) AS delay_var, AVG(rht.jitter) AS jitter, AVG(rht.jitter_std) AS jitter_std, AVG(rht.jitter_var) AS jitter_var, AVG(rht.loss_rate) AS loss_rate, SUM(rht.fail) AS fail, SUM(rht.total) AS total FROM record_hour_tracert rht LEFT JOIN city ON rht.city_id = city.city_id LEFT JOIN county ON rht.county_id = county.county_id INNER JOIN probe ON rht.probe_id = probe.id INNER JOIN target ON rht.target_id = target.id WHERE rht.record_date BETWEEN #{ava_start} AND #{ava_terminal} AND rht.port = #{port} AND rht.probe_id = #{probe_id} GROUP BY rht.port,rht.probe_id
